Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Gravity = 196.20
Rate = (1 / 60)
Sparkle = script:WaitForChild("Sparkle") SparkleScript = script:WaitForChild("SparkleScript")
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, }
BaseSparklePart = BasePart:Clone() BaseSparklePart.Name = "Effect" BaseSparklePart.Transparency = 1 BaseSparklePart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) BaseSparklePart.CanCollide = false BaseSparklePart.Anchored = true
Sounds = { LightUp = Handle:WaitForChild("LightUp"), Spark = Handle:WaitForChild("Spark") }
Colors = { Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Color3.new(1, 1, 1), Color3.new(0, 0, 1), }
ToolEquipped = false
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function CreateSparks() if not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end local ModelName = (Player.Name .. "'s Sparkles") local MainSparkleModel = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(ModelName) if not MainSparkleModel then MainSparkleModel = Create("Model"){ Name = ModelName, } local SparkleScriptCopy = SparkleScript:Clone() SparkleScriptCopy.Disabled = false SparkleScriptCopy.Parent = MainSparkleModel end
if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end
local CurrentlyEquipped = true
ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end)
local NumberOfSparkles = 35 local DelayedNumber = 3
for i = 1, NumberOfSparkles, DelayedNumber do
if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end
for ii = 1, DelayedNumber do
if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end
local SparklePart = BaseSparklePart:Clone() SparklePart.CFrame = (Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new((math.random(-250, 250) * 0.001), ((Handle.Size.Y / 2) + (math.random(-250, 250) * 0.001)), (math.random(-250, 250) * 0.001)))
local Color = Colors[math.random(1, #Colors)] local SparkleEffect = Sparkle:Clone() SparkleEffect.Adornee = SparklePart local SparkleImage = SparkleEffect:FindFirstChild("Image") SparkleImage.ImageColor3 = Color SparkleEffect.Parent = SparklePart SparkleEffect.Enabled = true
local Light = Create("PointLight"){ Name = "Light", Range = 3, Brightness = 100, Color = Color, Enabled = true, Parent = SparklePart, }
local Velocity = math.random(5, 15) local Direction = (SparklePart.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.random(-360, 360) * 0.01), 0)).lookVector local Values = { {Name = "Direction", Class = "Vector3Value", Value = Vector3.new(Direction.X, 1, Direction.Z)}, {Name = "AccelerationVelocity", Class = "Vector3Value", Value = Vector3.new(0, (5 + math.random(0, 10)), (3 + math.random(0, 5)))}, {Name = "DecelerationVelocity", Class = "Vector3Value", Value = Vector3.new(0, -25, 0)}, {Name = "Velocity", Class = "Vector3Value", Value = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)}, } for i, v in pairs(Values) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = SparklePart, } end
SparklePart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) SparklePart.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
Debris:AddItem(SparklePart, 1.5)
SparklePart.Parent = MainSparkleModel
end
wait(Rate)
end
if not MainSparkleModel.Parent and MainSparkleModel.Name == ModelName then MainSparkleModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false Sounds.Spark:Play() CreateSparks() wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Sounds.LightUp:Play() ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris") RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
SpreadRate = 0.25
Sparkles = {}
function RemoveIfEmpty() local Children = (#Model:GetChildren() - 1) if Children == 0 then Model.Name = "" Debris:AddItem(Model, 0.5) Model:Destroy() end end
Spawn(function() RunService.Heartbeat:connect(function() for i, v in pairs(Sparkles) do if v.Sparkle and v.Sparkle.Parent then if v.Acceleration.Magnitude >= 1.5 then --Increase velocity local AbsorptionRate = 0.75 local VelocityGiven = (v.Acceleration * AbsorptionRate) local VelocityTaken = (v.Acceleration * (1 - AbsorptionRate)) v.Velocity = (v.Velocity + (VelocityGiven * 0.01)) v.Acceleration = (v.Acceleration - VelocityTaken) elseif v.Deceleration.Magnitude >= 1.5 then --Decrease velocity local AbsorptionRate = 0.5 local VelocityGiven = (v.Deceleration * AbsorptionRate) local VelocityTaken = (v.Deceleration * (1 - AbsorptionRate)) v.Velocity = (v.Velocity - (VelocityGiven * 0.01)) v.Acceleration = (v.Deceleration + VelocityTaken) else --Maintain velocity end v.Sparkle.CFrame = (v.Sparkle.CFrame + v.Direction * Vector3.new(v.Velocity.Z, v.Velocity.Y, v.Velocity.Z)) else table.remove(Sparkles, i) if #Sparkles == 0 then RemoveIfEmpty() end end end end) end)
function HandleSparkles(Object) if Object:IsA("BasePart") and Object.Name == "Effect" then local Direction = Object:FindFirstChild("Direction") local Velocity = Object:FindFirstChild("Velocity") local Acceleration = Object:FindFirstChild("AccelerationVelocity") local Deceleration = Object:FindFirstChild("DecelerationVelocity") if not Direction or not Velocity or not Acceleration or not Deceleration then return end table.insert(Sparkles, { Sparkle = Object, Direction = Direction.Value, Velocity = Velocity.Value, Acceleration = Acceleration.Value, Deceleration = Deceleration.Value, }) end end
Model.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) Spawn(function() HandleSparkles(Child) end) end)
for i, v in pairs(Model:GetChildren()) do Spawn(function() HandleSparkles(v) end) end
RemoveIfEmpty()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
